EEO_Communications.subject: Update on your Employee Rights claim.
EEO_Communications.body:
Hello,

Thank you for considering Morgan & Morgan for your employment law inquiry. After careful review of your potential case, we recommend seeking counsel from another source who can better cater to your claim.

Here are some credible resources to assist you in finding the right fit:

Employment Lawyers: National Employment Lawyers Association
Costs and legal fees assistance: Law Help
If you're filing discrimination charges contact the Equal Employment Opportunity Commission to receive a posit

ce: Law Help

FMLA_Communications.body:
Good morning,

As discussed, I want to cycle back to you to let you know that your request for FMLA has been approved effective 5/01/2019.  I have copied Jamie McAllister on this communication as well.

The Family and Medical Leave Act (FMLA)<https://www.dol.gov/whd/fmla/> generally provides employees with up to 12 weeks of unpaid, job-protected leave per year once an employee is determined to be eligible.
